attributes.action: Scrap the Advanced British Standard and bring back the A levels instead.
attributes.additional_details: We want to do this because we believe the three years should be dedicated to get you ready for university and help you find your interest and passion for the future. We don’t think that we should spend more hours on english and maths rather than the topics that really matter towards the future for our job. Even though maths and english are important we have been learning it since reception and we should be focusing more on the topic related to the topic we take at university and our job.
attributes.background: We want the Advanced British Standard to be scrapped and bring back the A levels instead.We want to have a brighter future by spending more time on the topics we both enjoy and have passion for so we have better understanding when it comes to getting a degree or job.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not introduce a new 'Advanced British Standard Qualification': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647461

Do not make Mathematics and English a requirement up to 18: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647430
